channel.title: Hmm i wanna see if anyone can help me do this
channel.description:
Okay, i dont know if anyone has beaten the quest [i]Ictchlarins Little Helper[/i] on runescape, but if you have, and youre a good coder, you may be help to me....
Okay, so you know about when youre in the pyramid and it has that little black ring around your screen right? Well i wanted to maybe make it so you can do that when you enter certain areas... If anyone can help me with it, please message me or just post here. Thx :D

item.title: Hmm i wanna see if anyone can help me do this
item.dc:creator: @gho5t gho5t

@gho5t wrote:

Thats what half the people who i asked for help told me to do when i didnt know where to put a command or things like that, and i didnt mean to be such a harsh critic… srry

item.title: Hmm i wanna see if anyone can help me do this
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

This is the HELP section, and everyone who needs help should feel welcome here.

Though people should make an effort to learn basic java, you are right. Gho5t, please try to be more respectful with your criticism. For example, link to a tutorial instead of just telling people to go learn the basics. Sometimes new members need a shove in the right direction, but a gentle nudge is more helpful.

Read full topic

item.title: Hmm i wanna see if anyone can help me do this

@system wrote:

It doesn’t matter whether you were answering questions or not. This is the HELP section, and everyone who needs help should feel welcome here. If you don’t want to answer a question, then don’t, but don’t frigging tell someone who is asking for help to go learn java. FFS.
